setup_new_election_desc: Create a new election (region, phase, registration fee).
use_setup_new_election: Use 'Setup new election' to create one.
name: Name
approve_candidate_desc: Approve this candidate for the ballot.
no_active_election: No active election in this region.
must_resign_job: You must resign from your %s job before running for governor.
no_active_registration: No active registration in this region.
not_approved_resident: You are not an approved resident in this region.
must_be_resident: You must be a resident of this region to run for governor.
must_carry_residency_document: You must carry your residency document to run for governor.
already_applied: You have already applied as a candidate in this election.
application_submitted: Your candidacy application has been submitted for review.
only_owner_review: Only the server owner may review candidates.
no_election_found: No election found for your region.
registration_phase_only: You can only apply during Registration phase.
must_be_resident_vote: You must be a registered resident to vote.
must_be_resident_region: You can only vote in your home region.
only_owner_open_election_menu: Only the server owner can open the election menu.
election_created_success: Election #%d created for region %s. Phase: Idle.
could_not_determine_region_hash: Could not determine region hash for finalizing.
winner_record_missing: Winner record missing, cannot install governor.
failed_to_install_governor: Failed to automatically install governor. Check rsg-governor / winner online state.
failed_to_set_phase_registration: Failed to set phase to Registration.
failed_to_set_phase_campaign: Failed to set phase to Campaign.
failed_to_set_phase_voting: Failed to set phase to Voting.
registration_begun: Registration for the governor election in %s has begun on %s. You may now apply as a candidate.
campaign_begun: Campaign period for the governor election in %s has begun on %s. Support your preferred candidates.
voting_opened: Voting has opened for the governor election in %s on %s. Residents may now cast their votes.
election_concluded: The governor election in %s has concluded on %s. Results are now available.
set_phase_result_before_applying: Set phase to Result before applying result.
